metadata.title: CVE-2016-8729 on Ubuntu 20.04 ESM (focal) - medium
metadata.description:
An exploitable memory corruption vulnerability exists in the JBIG2 parserof Artifex MuPDF 1.9. A specially crafted PDF can cause a negative numberto be passed to a memset resulting in memory corruption and potential codeexecution. An attacker can specially craft a PDF and send to the victim totrigger this vulnerability.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-8729` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

jbig2dec - 0.13-4.1
libjbig2dec0 - 0.13-4.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: jbig2dec package in focal, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.13-4.1').
